rent from.
Please stop references to nesting. An individual coming out of a DV situation should never be in a nest situation.
The CC debt has climbed again. We never lived off salary and always paid bills from stock and bonus. They will be due again soon.
Message 209 of 4024
Details sent to Hotmail.
I do not want to argue with you. We had a plan to nest. Period. That was our plan of record. You decided that Yurushka’s label was appropriate and I
won’t argue that point or the change in perspective.
But prior to that, whatever we had then, it was ok to nest. But you have changed your mind. That is fine. But I understand our history, it’s and our
evolution so to me it’s still confusing. But I accept that.
Yes. Divorce is expensive. I hope we can get a handle on our relationship well enough to work collaboratively together. I want to partner with you so
please let me know how to do you feel safe.
Sent:01/03/2024 at 10:52 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/03/2024 at 10:56 AM)
Subject:Re: Running List
Message 210 of 4024
You still do not recognize the DV aspect of the relationship. After insisting I keep it hidden for all those years, sunlight it was exposed you.
10k is just under the tuition and Alki rent.
I will pay Alki rent this afternoon.
We will need additional funds every month to pay tuition and rent. Those expenses have not changed. The income into the accounts has been
reduced.
Sent:01/03/2024 at 11:01 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/03/2024 at 11:01 AM)
Subject:Re: Running List
Message 211 of 4024
I do not. I agree. And I don’t agree that I asked you to hide anything. If our relationship was not normal for 29 years, I would have expected a
conversation.
But I don’t want to fight. Period. I’d like to understand it better as we had planned to do, but am willing to wait on your timeline. That’s most
important now.
Just because you decide to change your perspective, did not mean I stopped wanting to improve and be the best husband and father I could be to us.
Sent:01/03/2024 at 11:05 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/03/2024 at 11:07 AM)
Subject:Re: Running List
